cast: Keanu Reeves, Halle Berry, Ian McShane etc.
Writer: Derek Kolstad, Shay Hatten, Chris Collins, Marc Abrams.
description: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.

cast: Robert Pattinson, Zoë Kravitz, Paul Dano, Jeffrey Wright etc.
description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

cast: Ryan Reynolds, Walker Scobell, Mark Ruffalo, Jennifer Garner, Catherine Keener, Zoe Saldaña.
Writer: Jonathan Tropper, T.S. Nowlin, Jennifer Flackett, Mark Levin
description: After accidentally crash-landing in 2022, time-traveling fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self for a mission to save the future.
A well-to-do husband who allows his wife to have affairs in order to avoid a divorce becomes a prime suspect in the disappearance of her lovers.

cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, John Abraham, Dimple Kapadia, Ashutosh Rana
description: An Indian spy takes on the leader of a group of mercenaries who have nefarious plans to target his homeland.

cast: Brad Pitt, Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson
description: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.

cast: Ryan Gosling, Chris Evans, Ana de Armas
Writer: Joe Russo, Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely
description: When the CIA's most skilled operative, whose true identity is known to none, accidentally uncovers dark agency secrets, a psychopathic former colleague puts a bounty on his head, setting off a global manhunt by international assassins.

cast: Tom Cruise, Miles Teller, Jennifer Connelly
Writer: Ehren Kruger, Eric Warren Singer, Christopher McQuarrie
description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

cast: Millie Bobby Brown, Sam Claflin, Henry Cavill
description: When Enola Holmes (Sherlock's teen sister) discovers her mother is missing, she endeavors to find her, becoming a super-sleuth in her own right as she outwits her famous brother and unravels a dangerous conspiracy.

cast: Dwayne Johnson, Aldis Hodge, Pierce Brosnan
Writer: Adam Sztykiel, Rory Haines, Sohrab Noshirvani
description: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.

cast: Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Jonathan Majors
description: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne, along with Hank Pym and Janet Van Dyne, explore the Quantum Realm, where they interact with strange creatures and embark on an adventure that goes beyond the limits of what they thought was possible.

Writer: Chris McKenna, Erik Sommers, Stan Lee
description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

cast: Jake Gyllenhaal, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Eiza González
description: Two robbers steal an ambulance after their heist goes awry.

movie_title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
cast: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek Pinault, Harvey Guillén
Writer: Paul Fisher, Tommy Swerdlow, Tom Wheeler
description: When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

cast: Chris Hemsworth, Christian Bale, Tessa Thompson
description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.
